title: NOTICE OF ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING
summary: Ellah Lakes Plc has announced its Annual General Meeting (AGM) scheduled for December 6, 2019, at Constantial Hotel, Benin City, Edo State. The agenda includes receiving the audited financial statements for the year ended July 31, 2019, re-electing directors, authorizing auditor remuneration, and electing audit committee members. The register of members will be closed from November 11 to November 15, 2019, for preparations for the AGM.
resolutions: To receive the audited financial statements of the Company for the year ended July 31, 2019 and the reports of the directors, auditors and audit committee thereon
To re-elect directors retiring by rotation
To authorize the directors to fix the remuneration of auditors
To elect members of the audit committee
locations: Constantial Hotel, No .24-26 Airport Road, Benin City, Edo State
